Package com.qam2.utils

Class LayoutUtil

java.lang.Object
com.qam2.utils.LayoutUtil
public abstract class LayoutUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Provides static functions to build common layout configurations.

    • buildHBoxContainer

      public static javafx.scene.layout.HBox buildHBoxContainer​(int spacing, javafx.geometry.Pos alignment, javafx.geometry.Insets insets, javafx.scene.Node... nodes)
      Creates common HBox layout used throughout application.
      Parameters:
      spacing - Spacing between HBox child nodes.
      alignment - Alignment of HBox child nodes.
      insets - The HBox's margin.
      nodes - Vararg of children to add to HBox.
      Returns:
      HBox node.

    • buildVBoxContainer

      public static javafx.scene.layout.VBox buildVBoxContainer​(int spacing, javafx.geometry.Pos alignment, javafx.geometry.Insets insets, javafx.scene.Node... nodes)

      Parameters:
      spacing - Spacing between VBox child nodes.
      alignment - Alignment of VBox child nodes.
      insets - The VBox's margin.
      nodes - Vararg of children to add to VBox.
      Returns:
      VBox node.

    • getTextElement

      public static javafx.scene.layout.HBox getTextElement​(java.lang.String text, javafx.geometry.Pos pos, java.lang.String styleClass)
      Creates common text node layout used throughout application.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display.
      pos - The alignment of the text within HBox container.
      styleClass - CSS style class.
      Returns:
      HBox node.
